name: builtin/sentence_splitter
description: 句子拆分插件，将长句和复合句拆分为更短的句子
author: SubtitleFormatter Team

enabled.description: 是否启用句子拆分功能

min_recursive_length.description: 最小递归长度阈值，低于此长度不再递归拆分

max_depth.description: 最大递归深度，防止过度递归

max_degradation_round.description: 最大退化轮次：1=严格模式(只执行第1轮)，3=中等模式，5=宽松模式(执行全部5轮)

examples.input: This is a very long sentence that contains multiple clauses and should be split into shorter, more manageable parts.
examples.output:
This is a very long sentence that contains multiple clauses,
and should be split into shorter, more manageable parts.
examples.description: 将长句拆分为更短的句子

examples.input: The project was successful, however, we need to improve the quality, and we should also consider the cost.
examples.output:
The project was successful,
however, we need to improve the quality,
and we should also consider the cost.
examples.description: 基于连接词和标点符号拆分复合句
